com.paypal.selion.utils

Class SauceConnectManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.utils.SauceConnectManager

  • public class SauceConnectManager
extends Object
    Handles opening a SSH Tunnel using the Sauce Connect logic. The class maintains a cache of Process instances mapped against the corresponding plan key.

      • openConnection

        public Process openConnection(String username,
                     String apiKey,
                     File sauceConnectJar,
                     String options,
                     String httpsProtocol,
                     PrintStream printStream)
                       throws IOException
        Creates a new Java process to run the Sauce Connect library.
        Parameters:
        username - - the name of the Sauce OnDemand user
        apiKey - - the API Key for the Sauce OnDemand user
        sauceConnectJar - - the Jar file containing Sauce Connect. If null, then we attempt to find Sauce Connect from the classpath
        options - - The options to be passed on to the sauce connect jar [ it should be space separated values ]
        httpsProtocol - - The protocol to be made use of
        printStream - - A PrintStream object to redirect the output from Sauce Connect to. Can be null
        Returns:
        - A Process instance which represents the Sauce Connect instance
        Throws:
        IOException

        public boolean checkUserExists(String username)
